At least 12 dead in suspected attempt to rescue son of Mexican cartel hitmanAt least 12 suspected criminals were killed on a highway near Hermosillo in the northern Mexican state of Sonora, a state official said Sunday, in what authorities called a foiled attempt to rescue the son of a cartel hitman. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 00:00:14 GMT HZYUY64VR5JZTBQIY4F7FLHGSE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/least-12-dead-suspected-attempt-rescue-son-mexican-cartel-hitman-2024-01-22/Reuters世界美洲
Israeli, Palestinian ministers to attend EU peace meetingThe Israeli and Palestinian foreign ministers are to meet their European Union counterparts on Monday as the EU considers potential steps toward a comprehensive peace between the two sides even as the war in Gaza rages on. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 23:16:52 GMT BH2MWNWGZVMJLBXGDVWSF2XRIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-palestinian-ministers-attend-meeting-where-eu-will-push-peace-2024-01-21/Andrew Gray世界中东
Sarah Ferguson, Duchess of York, diagnosed with skin cancerSarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York, has been diagnosed with a form of skin cancer, British media reported on Sunday, in another health problem for a member of Britain's royal family. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 19:27:20 GMT 5B4NBDZTHVPPNJ23SSDPEKVCA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britains-duchess-york-diagnosed-with-skin-cancer-2024-01-21/Reuters世界英国
Over 100 flights cancelled at Dublin airport due to stormAirlines cancelled 102 flights in and out of Dublin airport on Sunday due to a storm that was forecast to rage for the rest of the day, the airport operator said. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 18:24:31 GMT RPWW3SMZ3JPOVEYJB7E5AAMQFA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/over-100-flights-cancelled-dublin-airport-due-storm-2024-01-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Netanyahu rejects Hamas conditions for Israeli hostage dealNetanyahu, who is under pressure to secure the release of the hostages, said "the monsters of Hamas" want terms of outright surrender, including "the release of all the murderers and rapists." Sun, 21 Jan 2024 18:08:41 GMT 2LXVZHGRWJJC3JPVQAN3WU7WHE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-netanyahu-rejects-hamas-conditions-hostage-deal-which-include-outright-2024-01-21/Emily Rose世界中东
Hundreds of thousands demonstrate against right-wing extremism in GermanyHundreds of thousands of people have taken to the streets across towns and cities in Germany this weekend as the country enters a second week of nationwide protests against the right-wing Alternative for Germany (AfD) party. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 16:26:44 GMT T3XLXSMG5BLXTJFGQHWJVAWZKA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hundreds-thousands-demonstrate-against-right-wing-extremism-germany-2024-01-21/Emma-Victoria Farr, Holger Hansen世界欧洲
Bereaved family members plant trees in Israeli memorial for festival deadSome of the bereaved families whose loved ones were killed in a Hamas rampage at the Nova music festival joined an Israeli Jewish nature project group on Sunday for a special tree-planting event at the site. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 16:20:05 GMT EPAJWZRQKVNJNCR26DGXGRFNYU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/bereaved-family-members-plant-trees-israeli-memorial-festival-dead-2024-01-21/Leonardo Benassatto世界中东
French warship treats injured Gazans off Egyptian shoreAbout 1,000 people from Gaza have been treated in a French field hospital aboard a ship off the coast of Egypt, its captain said, providing care for some as health infrastructure in the war-devastated enclave collapses. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 15:02:11 GMT XMISH4HPYZN3TJ7DWTYXWQJEP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/french-warship-treats-around-1000-injured-gazans-off-egyptian-shore-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Pope Francis calls for release of nuns, other hostages kidnapped in HaitiPope Francis on Sunday called for the release of hostages, including six nuns, who were kidnapped on a bus in Haiti on Friday, and said he was praying for social harmony in the country. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 14:40:23 GMT EVN34U7E3VIIXOQZ4E7YQ6YM34 https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-francis-calls-release-nuns-other-hostages-kidnapped-haiti-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Local Taliban officials say two dead, four survivors in Afghanistan plane crashTwo Taliban officials in the northern Afghan province of Badakhshan said on Sunday that two passengers were killed in a plane crash involving a charter aircraft in the province but they said four others had survived. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 14:37:53 GMT FHO3Q4ZXFBMIJNCSB7EOYCNWKE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/local-taliban-officials-say-two-dead-four-survivors-afghanistan-plane-crash-2024-01-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Tel Aviv airport traffic plunged in last three months of 2023Air travel to and from Israel plunged in the last three months of 2023 amid the Israel-Hamas conflict, but the number of passengers travelling through Ben Gurion International Airport near Tel Aviv still rose 10% in 2023. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 12:18:03 GMT G3N2UFVVZJPJJMC7J7H5TBMJIY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/air-traffic-climbs-israels-tel-aviv-airport-2023-war-weighs-2024-01-21/Steven Scheer世界中东
